content.title: CumeTV | CumeTV Wiki | Fandom
content.description: CumeTV is a 24/7 hyperrealistic content platform that delivers immersive experiences through its proprietary VR system, CumeVision. Founded by Someone, it has become a global pastime due to rising temperatures and outdoor conditions, exerting a significant influence on culture.

CumeTV

CumeTV is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Somewhere Systems, a mega-national company dedicated to creating and funding companies which assist in the conglomerate's race to the financial singularity. Through the use of its proprietary VR system, CumeVision, CumeTV delivers hyperrealistic content 24/7 to the citizens of the world.

Contents
1	History
2	Programming
3	Society and culture
4	Notable figures
History

See: Timeline of CumeTV

Programming

See also: List of CumeTV Channels

Programming on CumeTV is vast and varied. It can be accessed through a CumeSlab (a now-discontinued beta device, but most channels still work), a CumeVision headset, or an intracranial implant. Most viewers use the CumeVision, as it is the most all-around accessible and engrossing experience.

Society and culture

Due to rising temperatures and dangerous outdoor conditions, most people must stay indoors. Therefore, CumeTV, a cheap, stationary activity, is the most popular global pastime. It exerts such a huge influence on culture, it is in essence the only culture now generated.

Notable figures

Someone - founder

Cumin McKinney - creative director
